ai-atk-s0301a10:127_10: “The foremost of my laymen in the four ways of being inclusive as laymen by a lay follower is Hatthaka of Āḷavī.”
ai-atk-s0301a10:130_0: The Linked Discourses on Native Spirits is finished.
